statements: SELECT * FROM BatteryUsage WHERE drone_id = 1
SELECT battery_level, timestamp FROM BatteryUsage WHERE charging_cycles > 5
SELECT drone_id, battery_level FROM BatteryUsage ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM BatteryUsage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01'
SELECT AVG(battery_level) AS average_battery_level FROM BatteryUsage WHERE drone_id = 2
SELECT * FROM BatteryUsage WHERE drone_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT drone_id, MAX(battery_level) AS max_battery_level FROM BatteryUsage GROUP BY drone_id;
SELECT AVG(battery_level) AS avg_battery_level, SUM(charging_cycles) AS total_charging_cycles FROM BatteryUsage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT drone_id, charging_cycles FROM BatteryUsage WHERE charging_cycles > 10 ORDER BY charging_cycles ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT drone_id, MIN(battery_level) AS min_battery_level FROM BatteryUsage WHERE timestamp > '2022-06-01' AND timestamp < '2022-07-01' GROUP BY drone_id;
SELECT * FROM BatteryUsage
SELECT drone_id, battery_level, charging_cycle_id FROM BatteryUsage
SELECT usage_date, battery_level FROM BatteryUsage WHERE drone_id = 1
SELECT * FROM ChargingCycles
SELECT charging_cycle_id, start_date, end_date FROM ChargingCycles
SELECT * FROM BatteryUsage BU JOIN ChargingCycles CC ON BU.charging_cycle_id = CC.charging_cycle_id
SELECT drone_id, SUM(battery_level) AS total_battery_used FROM BatteryUsage GROUP BY drone_id
SELECT * FROM ChargingCycles WHERE total_charging_time > 5 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT drone_id, MIN(usage_date) AS first_usage_date FROM BatteryUsage GROUP BY drone_id
SELECT * FROM BatteryUsage WHERE DATE(usage_date) = '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM DroneBatteryStatus;
SELECT drone_id, battery_percentage FROM DroneBatteryStatus ORDER BY drone_id DESC;
SELECT station_id, location, max_capacity FROM ChargingStations WHERE max_capacity > 50;
SELECT * FROM DroneChargingHistory ORDER BY end_time DESC;
SELECT drone_id, start_time, end_time, energy_transferred FROM DroneChargingHistory WHERE energy_transferred > 1000;
SELECT * FROM DroneBatteryStatus WHERE battery_percentage > 50 ORDER BY drone_id ASC
SELECT drone_id, battery_percentage FROM DroneBatteryStatus WHERE charging_cycles < 5 ORDER BY battery_percentage DESC
SELECT station_id, location FROM ChargingStations WHERE max_capacity > 10 ORDER BY station_id ASC
SELECT * FROM DroneChargingHistory WHERE energy_transferred >= 100 ORDER BY history_id DESC
SELECT drone_id, station_id, end_time FROM DroneChargingHistory WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY end_time DESC
SELECT * FROM drones;
SELECT drone_id, battery_level, charging_cycles FROM drones;
SELECT drone_id, battery_level, charging_cycles FROM drones WHERE battery_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM drone_locations ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM battery_replacement WHERE date_replaced BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM drones;
SELECT drone_id, battery_level, charging_cycles FROM drones WHERE charging_cycles >= 5 ORDER BY battery_level DESC;
SELECT d.drone_id, b.date_replaced, b.battery_level FROM drones d INNER JOIN battery_replacement b ON d.drone_id = b.drone_id WHERE b.battery_level < 30;
SELECT d.drone_id, d.battery_level, c.charging_capacity FROM drones d LEFT JOIN charging_stations c ON d.drone_id = c.location_id WHERE c.charging_capacity > 50;
SELECT dl.location_id, dl.latitude, dl.longitude, d.battery_level FROM drone_locations dl INNER JOIN drones d ON dl.drone_id = d.drone_id WHERE d.battery_level > 50 ORDER BY dl.latitude ASC;
SELECT * FROM drones;
SELECT drone_id, charging_cycles FROM drones WHERE battery_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM battery_charging_stations ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM charging_sessions WHERE end_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT drone_id, status FROM drone_status WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT drone_id, battery_level FROM drones;
SELECT station_id, location, charging_capacity FROM battery_charging_stations ORDER BY charging_capacity DESC;
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM charging_sessions WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT drone_id, status FROM drone_status WHERE status = 'ACTIVE';
SELECT log_id, drone_id, power_consumed FROM power_consumption_logs WHERE power_consumed > 50 ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
